Class RadixApplicationAPI.Transaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.radixdlt.client.application.RadixApplicationAPI.Transaction
  • Enclosing class:
    RadixApplicationAPI

    public final class RadixApplicationAPI.Transaction
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an atomic transaction to be committed to the ledger
